title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for left Riemann sum

1 point is earned for the answer

∫ 2 13 f(x)dx≈f(2)(3−2)+f(3)(5−3)+f(5)(8−5)+f(8)(13−8)=18 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6264@
